featured.text: But it later turned out that it was exactly his courage to “rebel” and to express his own ideas that marks his films with distinct creativity.
The high school student showed ______ courage when she helped the old man escape from the fire.
They find special courage when they need it.
Judo helped Popole Misenga to be strong both physically and mentally, and gave him the courage to escape from the (B) of his coaches.

definition.zh_def: 勇氣，面對困難或恐懼時的堅定和勇敢。
definition.en_def: The ability to confront fear, pain, danger, or adversity with determination and bravery.
definition.example: It takes a lot of courage to stand up for what you believe in.
